name: devops-journey
description: End-to-end DevOps learning project with React, Node.js, and MongoDB

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && serve -s frontend/build -l 3000
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup

author: DevOps Journey Team
